title: General
fullText:
Earthing shall be carried out in accordance with the requirements of this Clause and the requirements of AS/NZS 3000.
The minimum size of any protective earthing system conductor shall be not less than that required by AS/NZS 3000.
The minimum size of any EP bonding system conductor associated with the fixed wiring installed on site shall be 4 mm2.
NOTES:
1	The requirements specified in this Section for the EP earthing system do not imply a second earthing system but specify more stringent requirements to those in AS/NZS 3000.
2	This EP earthing system is additional to the EP bonding conductors required by AS/NZS 3000.
